name: Threaded Souls
description:
"Echoes of the past, shall always lurk into the future..."

Follow Toolbag and Weaver, two characters with fun abilities, find their way back to the tower while experiencing a cooperative game in individual mode. 

Travel through this mysterious rundown castle, immerse yourself in its ambience, explore and you might discover the truth of the place.

There is more than what meets the eye, for everything has a story to tell.

Features List:

  • Interchangeable characters, each with its own set of abilities.
  • Toolbag's ability to push and throw.
  • Weaver's ability to carry and bite.
  • Navigation based puzzle.
  • Captivating ambience.
    •                                                     In game press H for a surprise :)

    Three Wallpapers available for Wallpaper Engine from Toolbag and Weaver.
